id.description: The identifier of the AI assistant to use

openai_api_key_ref.description: Reference to the OpenAI API key. Required only when using OpenAI models

voice_settings.description: The settings associated with the voice selected

greeting.description: Text that will be played when the assistant starts, if none then nothing will be played when the assistant starts. The greeting can be text for any voice or SSML for `AWS.Polly.<voice_id>` voices. There is a 3,000 character limit.
greeting.example: Hello, can you tell me your age and where you live?

client_state.description: Use this field to add state to every subsequent webhook. It must be a valid Base-64 encoded string.

command_id.description: Use this field to avoid duplicate commands. Telnyx will ignore any command with the same `command_id` for the same `call_control_id`.
